<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// InlineAdvice that tracks changes post inlining. For that reason, it only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// overrides the &quot;successful inlining&quot; extension points.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fails, we can just update the cache with that value.</span></CodeLine>
